data.title: old Pooja Sharma provided dignified farewells for 4,000 forgotten souls
data.meta_description: Reflecting on the plight of those left without family for their final rites, Sharma has committed to being a surrogate family member. She maintains close ties with hospital mortuaries to learn about unclaimed corpses and arranges for their transportation to the nearest cremation ground, incurring costs for her compassionate mission. With expenses ranging from Rs 1,000 to Rs 1,500 for the hearse and Rs 1,000-1,200 for the last rites, Sharma conducts funeral rituals without discrimination based on caste or faith, dressed in a blue hoodie with plaited braids and silver nail paint. Having left her job as an HIV counselor two years ago, she sustains her mission through contributions from her grandmother, who receives a pension as a martyr's wife, and her father, a contract driver in the Delhi Metro. Exhausting her personal savings, Sharma has significantly cut down on materialistic expenses, and her consistent efforts have prompted some individuals to offer financial support. Additionally, Sharma has established an NGO named Bright the Soul Foundation, focusing on the welfare of marginalized communities, with the broader aim of inspiring and empowering people through her dedicated efforts.

Shocking! Lawyer rams Mercedes car into Kachori shop in Delhi, Six injured

In a shocking incident, six people were injured after a lawyer rammed his speeding Mercedes car into a Kachori shop in the national capital. The incident took place at Fateh Kachori in Civil Lines area. The police have taken the lawyer into custody and seized his car. The lawyer has been identified as Parag Maini who is a resident of Noida’s Sector 79. The police have registered a case against the lawyer under Section 279 (rash driving) and 337 (causing hurt by endangering life).

Goons hurl abuses at toll plaza employee in MP's Chhatarpur

Two goons hurled abuses at a toll plaza employee in Madhya Pradesh’s Chhatarpur. One of the assailants is reportedly the brother of an MLA. The incident was filmed by an employee of ol plaza which has gone viral on social media. The goons were upset after they had to wait in the queue.

Shirtless British man punches air steward after destroying aircraft toilet, arrested

A shirtless British man punched an air steward after destroying the aircraft toilet. The man was arrested. The man went berserk soon after the flight took off . He went up to smash the plane’s toilet. The incident took place on February 7 when the flight took off from Bangkok to London. A video of the incident went viral on social media.

On cam: Goons thrash Dalit youth in MP's Betul

A Dalit youth was thrashed in Madhya Pradesh’s Betul. The man was brutally thrashed and forced to squat while holding his ears. A video of the incident has gone viral on social media. Congress leader Jitu Patwari highlighted the plight of the Dalit man. The police have launched a probe into the matter.
